About Me

Ryan Gann

Welcome to my website! My name is Ryan and I am a 22 year old junior computer science student at the University of North Alabama. I enjoy designing websites, learning new technologies, and building computers. I'm currently searching for an internship for the Summer of 2020. Below are some languages and technologies that I am familiar with:

  • C++
  • Javascript
  • HTML
  • CSS & SCSS
  • Git & Github
  • Windows & Linux

Education

Bevill State Community College

Associate in Science Business Administration

After high school I studied business at Bevill State. Here I took various CIS, accounting, business law, and statistics classes.
I recieved my associates degree in 2018.

University of North Alabama

Bachelor in Computer Science Mathematics Minor

I am currently a senior at the University of North Alabama studying computer science and mathematics. Since beginning my studies here, I have learned a lot from my various computer, programming, and data structure classes.
I will graduate in the Spring of 2021.
